column2: ...$.....$......$Oh hi! I'm Lana, you must be PLAYER. Nice to meet you.
How can you be so cruel? Please, just go away...
Why would you give me this?
Oh! Ah... this is sweet... Thank you.
Oh wow... I really love this. Seriously... Thank you so much.
Oh hi! it's nice to see you today.
I made another doll for Benji, he always likes the dolls I make.
column3: My parents are so different. I sometimes if wonder is Mom knows what Dad sounds like.$They make a good team though.
column4: I hope dad brings back so nice wood, I've got an idea of something I could make.
column5: I tired making a doll for Keba once, she said she was too old to play with toys...
